title.rendered: 12 Deanna Road Wasaga Beach Ontario by <?php echo $name; ?>

content.rendered:
Portfolio

12 Deanna Road Wasaga Beach Custom Home by







































Previous
Next





































12 Deanna Road Wasaga Beach Custom Home by

Project Description

This bungalow in Wasaga Beach, ON  has a sophisticated modern design with striking canopies and use of complimentary materials put together in a very contemporary fashion. The large entrance canopy and glazed areas make this home very welcoming and pleasing. The construction is scheduled for completion in 2017. The Owners ,as well as , are very excited and looking forward to the completion of this “cool” house.
Share on facebook
Share on google
Share on twitter
Share on linkedin

Project Details

Cedar Springs Racquet Club Renovations

  • Client: Cedar Springs Health, Racquet and Sports Club
  • Location: 12 Deanna Road, Wasaga Beach, ON
  • GFA: 4 200 sq.f
  • Year Completed: 2017
  • Budget: $ 1 000,000
  • Architect:
